SEARCH
Package controller.db.impl

Class JdbcProductDao

java.lang.Object
controller.db.impl.JdbcProductDao
All Implemented Interfaces:
ProductDao
public class JdbcProductDao extends Object implements ProductDao
JdbcProductDao is an implementation of the ProductDao interface that provides a comprehensive set of methods for performing CRUD (Create, Read, Update, Delete) operations on products, ingredients, and allergens stored in a relational database using JDBC.

This class manages the database connection, ensuring proper handling of SQL queries related to product data, ingredients, and allergens. It encapsulates the logic for interacting with the underlying database and provides a clean API for other components of the application.

Each method in this class is designed to throw a SQLException if an error occurs during database operations, ensuring that the calling code can handle potential issues effectively.

Version:
0.1
Author:
DaniAndries

      public void saveProduct(Product product) throws SQLException

      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      product - the product to be saved.
      Throws:
